desc.en: 花凛在執行任務時，遇到被捉到頭盔團基地的老師。花凛看到被捉住的老師軟弱無力的一面，因此對老師很失望。但老師很快就靈機一動阻止了頭盔團的陰謀，這又讓花凛重新對老師刮目相看。
desc.jp: 花凛在執行任務時，遇到被捉到頭盔團基地的老師。花凛看到被捉住的老師軟弱無力的一面，因此對老師很失望。但老師很快就靈機一動阻止了頭盔團的陰謀，這又讓花凛重新對老師刮目相看。
desc.zh_cn: 花凛在运行任务时，遇到被捉到头盔团基地的老师。花凛看到被捉住的老师软弱无力的一面，因此对老师很失望。但老师很快就灵机一动阻止了头盔团的阴谋，这又让花凛重新对老师刮目相看。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

profile.en:
An agent of C&C, a secret organization from Millennium Science School.

She's in charge of providing rear fire support under the call sign Zero-Two. Despite her intimidating appearance, she is the most cautious of C&C's agents and often ends up having to reel in Asuna and Akane when they get out of control during missions.
profile.jp:
ミレニアムサイエンススクール所属、秘密組織「C&C」のエージェント。

コールサインは「ゼロツー」で、後方からの火力支援を担っている。外見はやや荒っぽそうなものの、実のところC&Cのエージェントの中でも最も慎重な性格の持ち主で、作戦中に暴走しがちなアスナやアカネを止めることに日々苦心している。
profile.zh_cn_jp:
千年科学学园所属，秘密组织「C&C」的特工。

呼号「Zero Two」，负责进行后方火力支援。
外表看上去有些粗暴，实际上却是C&C的特工里性格最慎重的人，每天都在为了控制容易在作战中失控的明日奈和茜而费心。
profile.zh_cn_tw:
千年科学学园所属，秘密组织「C&C」的特务。

代号为「Zero Two」，使用强大的火力负责后援。
和看似凶恶的外表不同，其实是C&C特务中最谨慎的人。每天在都为了阻止在作战中时常暴走的明日奈和朱音而伤脑筋。
profile.zh_cn_cn:
千禧年科技的秘密组织——“C&C”的特工。

她的代号为02，负责利用强大的火力在后方进行支援。
虽然她的外貌看上去有些咄咄逼人，但其实在所有C&C特工中行事风格最为慎重，作战中时常为了阻止明日奈或者茜的暴走而苦恼。

desc.zh_cn: 再次来到女仆咖啡厅的老师，得到获得特别会员证的机会，但却要求花凛用脚踩自己。老师被花凛踩在脚下，度过美好时光。

desc.en: While Aris and Veritas create a distraction, Midori, Momoi, and Sensei attempt a frontal assault on Seminar.
desc.jp: While Aris and Veritas create a distraction, Midori, Momoi, and Sensei attempt a frontal assault on Seminar.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 在爱丽丝和真理社成员进行佯攻作战的时候，绿、桃井和老师一起尝试正面突破研讨会。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 在爱丽丝和贝里塔斯成员进行佯攻作战的时候，绿、桃井和老师一起尝试正面突破研讨会。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 在爱丽丝和真理会成员进行佯攻作战的时候，绿、桃和老师一起尝试正面突破研讨会。

desc.en: Veritas' hacking ends up trapping Akane in a sealed room.
desc.jp: Veritas' hacking ends up trapping Akane in a sealed room.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 由于真理社暗中进行骇入行动，茜被困在密室里。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 由于贝里塔斯暗中进行骇入行动，朱音被困在密室里。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 由于真理会暗中进行骇入行动，茜被困在密室里。

desc.en: Aris took the role as forceful breakthrough girl, but was arrested at last. Akane expressed her liking towards Aris. Yuuka suddenly realized the trap in it, and enjoined the subordinate to replace the security system with the ones that were not from the Engineering Department.
desc.jp: Aris took the role as forceful breakthrough girl, but was arrested at last. Akane expressed her liking towards Aris. Yuuka suddenly realized the trap in it, and enjoined the subordinate to replace the security system with the ones that were not from the Engineering Department.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 爱丽丝充当强行突破的角色，然而不幸被捕。茜表示了对爱丽丝的喜欢。优香突然意识到其中的陷阱，嘱咐下属更换安保系统时避开由工程部研发的。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 爱丽丝充当强行突破的角色，然而不幸被捕。朱音表示了对爱丽丝的喜欢。优香突然意识到其中的陷阱，嘱咐下属更换安保系统时避开由工程师部研发的。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 爱丽丝充当强行突破的角色，然而不幸被捕。茜表示了对爱丽丝的喜欢。优香突然意识到其中的陷阱，嘱咐下属更换安保系统时避开由工程部研发的。

The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.

The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: During the meeting held two hours ago, Hare mentioned that the only way to access the Contraband Room would be the lifts. Yet both the lifts and the doors on the top floor should only be verified by fingerprints, and failed to verify that would also trigger multiple mechanisms. In order to break through the security system, Hibiki proposed to disable the system with EMP for a while, and by that means the Veritas would be able to hack in.
desc.jp: During the meeting held two hours ago, Hare mentioned that the only way to access the Contraband Room would be the lifts. Yet both the lifts and the doors on the top floor should only be verified by fingerprints, and failed to verify that would also trigger multiple mechanisms. In order to break through the security system, Hibiki proposed to disable the system with EMP for a while, and by that means the Veritas would be able to hack in.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 两小时前的作战会议中，晴提到到达保管所的地方唯有通过电梯到达，然而电梯和顶楼各区域的门只能通过指纹验证，且验证失败还会触发多种机关。为了突破安全系统，响提出用EMP手雷瘫痪所有系统，到时真理社即可开始骇入。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 两小时前的作战会议中，晴提到到达保管所的地方唯有通过电梯到达，然而电梯和顶楼各区域的门只能通过指纹验证，且验证失败还会触发多种机关。为了突破安全系统，响提出用EMP手雷瘫痪所有系统，到时贝里塔斯即可开始骇入。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 两小时前的作战会议中，晴提到到达保管所的地方唯有通过电梯到达，然而电梯和顶楼各区域的门只能通过指纹验证，且验证失败还会触发多种机关。为了突破安全系统，响提出用EMP手雷瘫痪所有系统，到时真理会即可开始骇入。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Akane thought herself would be meeting Momoi and Midori, which was then turned out to be Maki and Kotori of the Engineering Department. Akane requested to confirm the status, and it was then all of them realized that the surveillance network had been hacked.
desc.jp: Akane thought herself would be meeting Momoi and Midori, which was then turned out to be Maki and Kotori of the Engineering Department. Akane requested to confirm the status, and it was then all of them realized that the surveillance network had been hacked.

desc.en: Momoi and Midori was at the lift, while Akane and others were locked up together due to the unmatched fingerprints. Yuuka was too late to realize the trap set by Aris. Momoi, Midori and Sensei arrived at the floor and successfully unlocked with their own fingerprints, yet they still met other Seminar members.
desc.jp: Momoi and Midori was at the lift, while Akane and others were locked up together due to the unmatched fingerprints. Yuuka was too late to realize the trap set by Aris. Momoi, Midori and Sensei arrived at the floor and successfully unlocked with their own fingerprints, yet they still met other Seminar members.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 桃井和绿到达了电梯前，与此同时茜等人却因指纹不符而被一同关了起来。这时优香才意识到爱丽丝的问题，而桃井、绿与老师三人已经到达顶楼，并顺利用指纹开锁，但还是遇到了学生会成员。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 桃井和绿到达了电梯前，与此同时朱音等人却因指纹不符而被一同关了起来。这时优香才意识到爱丽丝的问题，而桃井、绿与老师三人已经到达顶楼，并顺利用指纹开锁，但还是遇到了学生会成员。

desc.en: Though the door stayed closed and unable to contact Asuna, Akane received a message from another partner - Karin. She confirmed that the Game Development Department members had already within the shooting range.
desc.jp: Though the door stayed closed and unable to contact Asuna, Akane received a message from another partner - Karin. She confirmed that the Game Development Department members had already within the shooting range.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 闸门虽无法打开，也联系不上明日奈，但这时茜收到了另一位同伴的消息——花凛确认，游戏开发部成员已进入射击范围。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 闸门虽无法打开，也联系不上明日奈，但这时朱音收到了另一位同伴的消息——花凛确认，游戏开发部成员已进入射击范围。

desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: The Game Development Department shakes off the Maid Club's sniper, Karin, with President Utaha's help. However, shortly after, they are confronted by another maid: Asuna.
desc.jp: The Game Development Department shakes off the Maid Club's sniper, Karin, with President Utaha's help. However, shortly after, they are confronted by another maid: Asuna.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 游戏开发部一行人在歌原部长的帮助下，成功甩开女仆部狙击手花凛，但另一名女仆部成员明日奈却出现在一行人面前。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 游戏开发部一行人在咏叶部长的帮助下，成功甩开女仆部狙击手花凛，但另一名女仆部成员明日奈却出现在一行人面前。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 游戏开发部一行人在歌原部长的帮助下，成功甩开女仆部狙击手花凛，但另一名女仆部成员明日奈却出现在一行人面前。

desc.en: When Momoi thought they were away from the threats, a single sniping bullet fired towards them. Midori realized it was Karin's doing. On the roof, as Karin prepared for the next shot, the Engineering Department came just in time and disturbed the plan. Momoi and others continued to advance immediately.
desc.jp: When Momoi thought they were away from the threats, a single sniping bullet fired towards them. Midori realized it was Karin's doing. On the roof, as Karin prepared for the next shot, the Engineering Department came just in time and disturbed the plan. Momoi and others continued to advance immediately.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 就在桃井一行人以为已经逃离了威胁后，一发狙击子弹向他们飞来，绿立刻意识到是狙击手花凛所为。在楼顶上，就在花凛准备继续下一发时，工程部及时阻止并扰乱了计划。桃井等人立刻继续前进。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 就在桃井一行人以为已经逃离了威胁后，一发狙击子弹向他们飞来，绿立刻意识到是狙击手花凛所为。在楼顶上，就在花凛准备继续下一发时，工程师部及时阻止并扰乱了计划。桃井等人立刻继续前进。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 就在桃一行人以为已经逃离了威胁后，一发狙击子弹向他们飞来，绿立刻意识到是狙击手花凛所为。在楼顶上，就在花凛准备继续下一发时，工程部及时阻止并扰乱了计划。桃等人立刻继续前进。

desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green

desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.

蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: Having taken too long, Akane and Karin escape their bonds, an event spelling disaster for the Game Development Department's mission. Just then, Aris came to the rescue and succeeded in infiltrating the Student Council's contraband storage room.
desc.jp: Having taken too long, Akane and Karin escape their bonds, an event spelling disaster for the Game Development Department's mission. Just then, Aris came to the rescue and succeeded in infiltrating the Student Council's contraband storage room.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 因为耽误到时间的关系，茜和花凛也从封锁中解放出来。就这样，游戏开发部又再次陷入危机。这时，爱丽丝及时现身解救游戏开发部，让一行人成功进入学生会扣押品保管所。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 因为耽误到时间的关系，朱音和花凛也从封锁中解放出来。就这样，游戏开发部又再次陷入危机。这时，爱丽丝及时现身解救游戏开发部，让一行人成功进入学生会扣押品保管所。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 因为耽误到时间的关系，茜和花凛也从封锁中解放出来。就这样，游戏开发部又再次陷入危机。这时，爱丽丝及时现身解救游戏开发部，让一行人成功进入学生会扣押品保管所。

desc.en: Yuuka put the confiscated robots into the battle. Asuna was tough to deal with. The Engineering Department failed to suppress the sniper Karin. Akane was on her way. At the seemingly hopeless moment, the Game Development Department remembered the meeting.
desc.jp: Yuuka put the confiscated robots into the battle. Asuna was tough to deal with. The Engineering Department failed to suppress the sniper Karin. Akane was on her way. At the seemingly hopeless moment, the Game Development Department remembered the meeting.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 优香命令将收缴来的机器人加入战场，明日奈的战力也绝非等闲之辈，工程部无力压制狙击手花凛，茜也正在赶来。在似乎无望之际，众人想起了之前会议的内容。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 优香命令将收缴来的机器人加入战场，明日奈的战力也绝非等闲之辈，工程师部无力压制狙击手花凛，朱音也正在赶来。在似乎无望之际，众人想起了之前会议的内容。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 优香命令将收缴来的机器人加入战场，明日奈的战力也绝非等闲之辈，工程部无力压制狙击手花凛，茜也正在赶来。在似乎无望之际，众人想起了之前会议的内容。

desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第二十七首曲子，尤其用于玩家输掉一场战斗后。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Everyone agreed that the plan itself tolerates zero failure, so a backup plan is required. After the power failure, Aris sensed that the time was ripe. She escaped the self-reflection room and headed to the Contraband Room.
desc.jp: Everyone agreed that the plan itself tolerates zero failure, so a backup plan is required. After the power failure, Aris sensed that the time was ripe. She escaped the self-reflection room and headed to the Contraband Room.
desc.zh_cn: 众人认为计划的容错率完全为零，因而需要准备后备计划。停电后，爱丽丝检测到时机成熟，逃出了反省室，前往保管所。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: Yuuka and others finally arrived and announced that the GDD would be confined or suspended. Aris appeared suddenly and got rid of the barriers with Sword of Light; Karin was re-suppressed as well. Aris mentioned that, in every RPG games she had played, the hero will never abandon friends. Encouraged, everyone started to engage.
desc.jp: Yuuka and others finally arrived and announced that the GDD would be confined or suspended. Aris appeared suddenly and got rid of the barriers with Sword of Light; Karin was re-suppressed as well. Aris mentioned that, in every RPG games she had played, the hero will never abandon friends. Encouraged, everyone started to engage.
desc.zh_cn: 优香等人终于到齐，宣布了要把游戏开发部关禁闭的处分。爱丽丝突然出现，以光之剑破除了障碍；花凛也被重新压制。爱丽丝特别提到，在所有RPG游戏中，勇者是从来不会放弃同伴的。受到鼓励的众人开始迎战。

desc.en: Akane apologizes to Neru for her failures, but Neru is more interested in how Aris managed to go toe-to-toe with the Maid Club. Back at the club room, the Game Development Department tries to use the Mirror to decrypt G.BIBLE.
desc.jp: Akane apologizes to Neru for her failures, but Neru is more interested in how Aris managed to go toe-to-toe with the Maid Club. Back at the club room, the Game Development Department tries to use the Mirror to decrypt G.BIBLE.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 战斗后，茜对任务失败一事向尼禄道歉，但尼禄却反而表示，对和女仆部打得不相上下的爱丽丝感兴趣。另一方面，回到社团活动室的游戏开发部一行人试着使用<镜子>解读<G.Bible>。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 战斗后，朱音对任务失败一事向宁瑠道歉，但宁瑠却反而表示，对和女仆部打得不相上下的爱丽丝感兴趣。另一方面，回到社团活动室的游戏开发部一行人试着使用<镜子>解读<G.Bible>。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 战斗后，茜对任务失败一事向妮露道歉，但妮露却反而表示，对和女仆部打得不相上下的爱丽丝感兴趣。另一方面，回到社团活动室的游戏开发部一行人试着使用<镜子>解读<G.Bible>。

desc.en: Akane apologized for accepting the request and making everyone being humiliated. Neru said the request was cancelled, and she was interested in Aris in particular. She instructed Asuna to grab all the information about the Game Development Department.
desc.jp: Akane apologized for accepting the request and making everyone being humiliated. Neru said the request was cancelled, and she was interested in Aris in particular. She instructed Asuna to grab all the information about the Game Development Department.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 茜为接下该项委托给大家蒙羞抱歉，尼禄则表示大可不必，并表示委托已被取消。尼禄对爱丽丝特别感兴趣，让明日奈等人去查清游戏开发部全员的资料。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 朱音为接下该项委托给大家蒙羞抱歉，宁瑠则表示大可不必，并表示委托已被取消。宁瑠对爱丽丝特别感兴趣，让明日奈等人去查清游戏开发部全员的资料。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 茜为接下该项委托给大家蒙羞抱歉，妮露则表示大可不必，并表示委托已被取消。妮露对爱丽丝特别感兴趣，让明日奈等人去查清游戏开发部全员的资料。

desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.zh_cn: 本页列出所有的主线故事的篇号及标题。

desc.en: The Game Development Department submits Tales Saga Chronicle 2 just before their deadline. Right after it uploads, the club room suddenly becomes the target of a shootout.
desc.jp: The Game Development Department submits Tales Saga Chronicle 2 just before their deadline. Right after it uploads, the club room suddenly becomes the target of a shootout.
desc.zh_cn: 游戏开发部一行人勉强赶上截止期限，完成了<传说年代记2>的开发。上传游戏后，游戏开发部社团活动室遭到来历不明的枪击。

desc.en: The shooter was Neru, the president of the Maid Club. Claiming that her last battle with Aris had piqued her interest, Neru challenges Aris to a fight. One destructive battle later, and Neru, satisfied, goes on her way.
desc.jp: The shooter was Neru, the president of the Maid Club. Claiming that her last battle with Aris had piqued her interest, Neru challenges Aris to a fight. One destructive battle later, and Neru, satisfied, goes on her way.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 对社团活动室发动枪击的，是女仆部的部长尼禄。尼禄说对上次的战斗大感兴趣，并对爱丽丝提出挑战。经过好一阵混战才满足地回去。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 对社团活动室发动枪击的，是女仆部的部长宁瑠。宁瑠说对上次的战斗大感兴趣，并对爱丽丝提出挑战。经过好一阵混战才满足地回去。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 对社团活动室发动枪击的，是女仆部的部长妮露。妮露说对上次的战斗大感兴趣，并对爱丽丝提出挑战。经过好一阵混战才满足地回去。

desc.en: The GDD finally finished it at the very last moment. Momoi uploaded the demo for everyone to download. The comments started flooding in, as the download counter counting fast. When everyone was worried and nervous, the club room was hit by a few bullet shots. Everyone began to engage.
desc.jp: The GDD finally finished it at the very last moment. Momoi uploaded the demo for everyone to download. The comments started flooding in, as the download counter counting fast. When everyone was worried and nervous, the club room was hit by a few bullet shots. Everyone began to engage.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 开发部众人终于在最后一刻完成了作品，桃井提出要将demo上传到网上供大家下载。评论开始涌来，下载量也在激增，而就在众人紧张不安时，社团突然被几发炮弹击中。众人开始迎战。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 开发部众人终于在最后一刻完成了作品，桃井提出要将demo上传到网上供大家下载。评论开始涌来，下载量也在激增，而就在众人紧张不安时，社团突然被几发炮弹击中。众人开始迎战。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 开发部众人终于在最后一刻完成了作品，桃提出要将demo上传到网上供大家下载。评论开始涌来，下载量也在激增，而就在众人紧张不安时，社团突然被几发炮弹击中。众人开始迎战。

desc.jp: The 11th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays at the "Recruitment" (Gacha) page.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十一首曲子，常在“招聘”（抽卡）页面播放。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

desc.en: Neru came and challenged the GDD. Neru praised for Yuzu's courage at first, then challenged Aris into a fight. She claimed that if Aris could defeat her, then everything from the past would no longer get pursued. Before she could react, Aris fired the Sword of Light.
desc.jp: Neru came and challenged the GDD. Neru praised for Yuzu's courage at first, then challenged Aris into a fight. She claimed that if Aris could defeat her, then everything from the past would no longer get pursued. Before she could react, Aris fired the Sword of Light.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 尼禄前来挑战开发部众人。尼禄先是称赞了柚子的勇气，然后向爱丽丝发出挑战，提出只要能打败她，以前的事情就一笔勾销。尼禄还没反应过来，爱丽丝就抢先发射了光之剑。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 宁瑠前来挑战开发部众人。宁瑠先是称赞了柚子的勇气，然后向爱丽丝发出挑战，提出只要能打败她，以前的事情就一笔勾销。宁瑠还没反应过来，爱丽丝就抢先发射了光之剑。

desc.en: Though Neru has a significant advantage in melee combat, but Aris, by pointing the railgun towards the floor and firing it, retreated at the cost of injuring herself 48%. Neru decided not to pursue afterwards.
desc.jp: Though Neru has a significant advantage in melee combat, but Aris, by pointing the railgun towards the floor and firing it, retreated at the cost of injuring herself 48%. Neru decided not to pursue afterwards.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 虽然尼禄在近战方面优势显著，但爱丽丝通过将光之剑朝向地面开炮，在自伤48%的情况下先行撤离。尼禄最后决定不再追究。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 虽然宁瑠在近战方面优势显著，但爱丽丝通过将光之剑朝向地面开炮，在自伤48%的情况下先行撤离。宁瑠最后决定不再追究。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 虽然妮露在近战方面优势显著，但爱丽丝通过将光之剑朝向地面开炮，在自伤48%的情况下先行撤离。妮露最后决定不再追究。

desc.en: While wandering around campus, Aris runs into Sumire, who is out on a jog. The two of them bond over being both comrades in arms as well as sports. As Aris continues her adventure, she runs into Asuna and Karin in their school uniforms off campus, and she invites them to join her party. That moment, Aris learns that Neru is looking for her and quickly takes off to another location.
desc.jp: While wandering around campus, Aris runs into Sumire, who is out on a jog. The two of them bond over being both comrades in arms as well as sports. As Aris continues her adventure, she runs into Asuna and Karin in their school uniforms off campus, and she invites them to join her party. That moment, Aris learns that Neru is looking for her and quickly takes off to another location.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 爱丽丝在校园移动的过程中，遇见了正在慢跑的堇。两人互相认为对方是同伴和运动伙伴，而后爱丽丝为了继续进行冒险而离开。爱丽丝在校外遇见了穿着校服的明日奈和花凛，她向两人提议下次一起去冒险，并且邀请两人加入队伍。听到尼禄在找爱丽丝的消息后，爱丽丝立刻前往其他地方。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 爱丽丝在校园移动的过程中，遇见了正在慢跑的堇。两人互相认为对方是同伴和运动伙伴，而后爱丽丝为了继续进行冒险而离开。爱丽丝在校外遇见了穿着校服的明日奈和花凛，她向两人提议下次一起去冒险，并且邀请两人加入队伍。听到宁瑠在找爱丽丝的消息后，爱丽丝立刻前往其他地方。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 爱丽丝在校园移动的过程中，遇见了正在慢跑的堇。两人互相认为对方是同伴和运动伙伴，而后爱丽丝为了继续进行冒险而离开。爱丽丝在校外遇见了穿着校服的明日奈和花凛，她向两人提议下次一起去冒险，并且邀请两人加入队伍。听到妮露在找爱丽丝的消息后，爱丽丝立刻前往其他地方。

desc.en: Walking in the campus, Aris and Sensei came to the Track & Field area. Aris heard a strange noise suddenly, and thought it was a "Random Enemy Encounter" event. It turned out to be Sumire. Sumire and Aris exchanged some benefits on sports and exercises.
desc.jp: Walking in the campus, Aris and Sensei came to the Track & Field area. Aris heard a strange noise suddenly, and thought it was a "Random Enemy Encounter" event. It turned out to be Sumire. Sumire and Aris exchanged some benefits on sports and exercises.
desc.zh_cn: 爱丽丝和老师在校园走着，来到了田径跑道。爱丽丝突然听见了奇怪的声音，认为是“遇敌事件”，结果原来是堇。堇和爱丽丝交谈了几句，互相交换了关于运动的好处之类。
等下，接下来要发生什么？！举例：第137首曲子

The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.

曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: Aris believed that the further the location, the more events would occur. And indeed they met C&C members Asuna and Karin, who were just on special missions. They exchanged a few and at last Karin mentioned that Neru was looking for Aris.

desc.en: Aris goes into a frenzy and loses consciousness, destroying the clubroom and attacking everyone in her wake. No one is able to stop Aris and the situation grows critical. At that moment, the C&C appears and knocks her out, then proceeds to defeat the suspicious machine. Everyone breathes a sigh of relief, but then Sensei receives an unexpected piece of news from Midori.
desc.jp: Aris goes into a frenzy and loses consciousness, destroying the clubroom and attacking everyone in her wake. No one is able to stop Aris and the situation grows critical. At that moment, the C&C appears and knocks her out, then proceeds to defeat the suspicious machine. Everyone breathes a sigh of relief, but then Sensei receives an unexpected piece of news from Midori.
desc.zh_cn: 暴走的爱丽丝失去理智，破坏了部室且攻击了在场的所有人。情况岌岌可危，没有人能阻止爱丽丝。C&C突然现身让爱丽丝昏厥，并且解决了可疑的机器人。正当觉得松一口气时，老师从绿的口中得知出乎意料之外的消息。

desc.en: Unable to knock down everyone, Aris recharged the Sword of Light. Maki tried to stop, but was suppressed by Aris instead. As everyone was out of choices, a familiar voice was heard.
desc.jp: Unable to knock down everyone, Aris recharged the Sword of Light. Maki tried to stop, but was suppressed by Aris instead. As everyone was out of choices, a familiar voice was heard.
desc.zh_cn: 因未能击倒众人，爱丽丝重新充能光之剑。真纪试图阻拦，但遭爱丽丝反向压制。就在众人束手无策时，一个熟悉的声音出现。
举例/联想：Let me think about it

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール
ミレニアムサイエンススクール
ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.jp: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.zh_cn: Key是爱丽丝数据库中的另一个人格，其最先是用来指引“王女”（即爱丽丝）摧毁基沃托斯的存在。在主线第二篇中，Key在与Divi:Sion军队的残骸触碰后被激活；在最终章中，爱丽丝向Key请求帮助，但过程中却被摧毁，Key一命换一命，将爱丽丝复活。已知的最后一份拷贝存储在桃井承载着G.BIBLE的游戏机上，但在经历这么多事件后，G.BIBLE出于未知状态。

desc.en: Upon hearing the explosions, C&C came and suppressed Aris altogether. When Neru asked about the cause and effect, Midori and Yuzu found Momoi was seriously injured, with great shock on their faces.
desc.jp: Upon hearing the explosions, C&C came and suppressed Aris altogether. When Neru asked about the cause and effect, Midori and Yuzu found Momoi was seriously injured, with great shock on their faces.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 尼禄听见爆炸声前来协助，C&C全体压制了爱丽丝。就在尼禄询问老师事情的前因后果时，绿和柚子突然一脸惊愕地发现桃井受伤严重。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 妮露听见爆炸声前来协助，C&C全体压制了爱丽丝。就在妮露询问老师事情的前因后果时，绿和柚子突然一脸惊愕地发现桃受伤严重。

desc.en: After Aris' departure, the students of Millennium are at a loss as to what to do. At that moment, the enfeebled Momoi rouses herself up and declares that they cannot stand idly by, and insists that everyone go to save Aris.
desc.jp: After Aris' departure, the students of Millennium are at a loss as to what to do. At that moment, the enfeebled Momoi rouses herself up and declares that they cannot stand idly by, and insists that everyone go to save Aris.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 送走爱丽丝后，千禧年的学生们都不知该如何是好，原本受伤的桃井突然现身说不能坐以待毙，而且提议要一起去拯救爱丽丝。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 送走爱丽丝后，千年的学生们都不知该如何是好，原本受伤的桃井突然现身说不能坐以待毙，而且提议要一起去拯救爱丽丝。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 送走爱丽丝后，千年的学生们都不知该如何是好，原本受伤的桃突然现身说不能坐以待毙，而且提议要一起去拯救爱丽丝。

desc.en: Sensei, alongside the Game Development Department, the Engineering Department and C&C, analyzed current situation. Everyone agreed that it was an emergency. Neru couldn't figure out what happened still, and everyone started to recalling them once again.
desc.jp: Sensei, alongside the Game Development Department, the Engineering Department and C&C, analyzed current situation. Everyone agreed that it was an emergency. Neru couldn't figure out what happened still, and everyone started to recalling them once again.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师与游戏开发部、工程部与C&C分析当前形势。众人一致同意爱丽丝被带走属于紧急事件，而尼禄则从始至终都无法理解其中的缘由，众人开始重新梳理。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师与游戏开发部、工程师部与C&C分析当前形势。众人一致同意爱丽丝被带走属于紧急事件，而宁瑠则从始至终都无法理解其中的缘由，众人开始重新梳理。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 老师与游戏开发部、工程部与C&C分析当前形势。众人一致同意爱丽丝被带走属于紧急事件，而妮露则从始至终都无法理解其中的缘由，众人开始重新梳理。

desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：Let me think about it

desc.en: Get ready for combat!Example: Encroached Sky、Polyphonic
desc.jp: Get ready for combat!Example: Encroached Sky、Polyphonic
desc.zh_cn: 全体就绪，准备战斗！举例/联想：Encroached Sky、Polyphonic

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: Rio told Aris that her real identity was in fact a "demon lord", and said that the only way to solve this was to destroy her halo. Yuzu and Midori believed the situation was untrue but words failed them. It was at this moment when Momoi showed up.
desc.jp: Rio told Aris that her real identity was in fact a "demon lord", and said that the only way to solve this was to destroy her halo. Yuzu and Midori believed the situation was untrue but words failed them. It was at this moment when Momoi showed up.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央向爱丽丝阐述爱丽丝实为“魔王”的身份，并表示只有破坏光环才能达成她的目的。柚子和绿坚信爱丽丝决不是这样，但却不好表达，就在这时桃井出现。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音向爱丽丝阐述爱丽丝实为“魔王”的身份，并表示只有破坏光环才能达成她的目的。柚子和绿坚信爱丽丝决不是这样，但却不好表达，就在这时桃井出现。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉央向爱丽丝阐述爱丽丝实为“魔王”的身份，并表示只有破坏光环才能达成她的目的。柚子和绿坚信爱丽丝决不是这样，但却不好表达，就在这时桃出现。

desc.en: The future here, seemed to be unforeseeable. Example: Alkaline Tears, Theme 140
desc.jp: The future here, seemed to be unforeseeable. Example: Alkaline Tears, Theme 140
desc.zh_cn: 这里的未来，似乎看不到了。举例/联想：Alkaline Tears、第140首曲子
举例/联想：第135首曲子、第140首曲子

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.jp: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

desc.en: Momoi appeared out of nowhere. Midori couldn't help but throw herself into Momoi's arms and wept. After knowing what happened, though hard to express feelings, Momoi said it was unacceptable and was determined to rescue Aris back. Everyone expressed approval and Neru even praised for her brave personality.
desc.jp: Momoi appeared out of nowhere. Midori couldn't help but throw herself into Momoi's arms and wept. After knowing what happened, though hard to express feelings, Momoi said it was unacceptable and was determined to rescue Aris back. Everyone expressed approval and Neru even praised for her brave personality.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 桃井突然出现，绿立刻扑到了姐姐的怀里哭泣。桃井在听了事情经过后，表示虽然不好言说自己的感受，但她知道这一切都不可接受，并且表示一定要将爱丽丝救回来。大家都表示了赞同，尼禄甚至还表扬了桃井大胆敢说的性格。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 桃井突然出现，绿立刻扑到了姐姐的怀里哭泣。桃井在听了事情经过后，表示虽然不好言说自己的感受，但她知道这一切都不可接受，并且表示一定要将爱丽丝救回来。大家都表示了赞同，宁瑠甚至还表扬了桃井大胆敢说的性格。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 桃突然出现，绿立刻扑到了姐姐的怀里哭泣。桃在听了事情经过后，表示虽然不好言说自己的感受，但她知道这一切都不可接受，并且表示一定要将爱丽丝救回来。大家都表示了赞同，妮露甚至还表扬了桃大胆敢说的性格。

desc.en: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.jp: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第64首曲子，于“游戏开发部”相关章节中广泛使用。其已经成为游戏开发部及其成员实质上的标志性曲目。

desc.en: The Game Development Department and others search for Aris' whereabouts. With the help of Noa and Yuuka, they learn that Aris is headed to Eridu, a fortified city that Rio built. Before infiltrating Eridu, Neru proposes a plan.
desc.jp: The Game Development Department and others search for Aris' whereabouts. With the help of Noa and Yuuka, they learn that Aris is headed to Eridu, a fortified city that Rio built. Before infiltrating Eridu, Neru proposes a plan.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 游戏开发部正在寻找爱丽丝的行踪。借由乃爱和优香的协助后，调查出爱丽丝已经前往莉央创造的要塞都市「埃里都」了。在潜入埃里都之前，尼禄提出一项作战方案。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 游戏开发部正在寻找爱丽丝的行踪。借由乃爱和优香的协助后，调查出爱丽丝已经前往莉音创造的要塞都市「埃里都」了。在潜入埃里都之前，宁瑠提出一项作战方案。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 游戏开发部正在寻找爱丽丝的行踪。借由乃爱和优香的协助后，调查出爱丽丝已经前往莉央创造的要塞都市「埃里都」了。在潜入埃里都之前，妮露提出一项作战方案。

desc.en: The all contacted Yuuka. Yuuka was surprised to hear that Aris had been taken away. Sensei asked help from Seminar and hoped to locate Aris.
desc.jp: The all contacted Yuuka. Yuuka was surprised to hear that Aris had been taken away. Sensei asked help from Seminar and hoped to locate Aris.
desc.zh_cn: 众人联系了优香等人，优香听闻爱丽丝被带走一事大为惊讶。老师向研讨会请求帮助，希望能确认爱丽丝的具体所在地。

desc.en: The 27th track in Blue Archive, used especially when the player loses the battle.
desc.jp: The 27th track in Blue Archive, used especially when the player loses the battle.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第二十七首曲子，尤其用于玩家输掉一场战斗后。

desc.en: As Sensei expected, Yuuka and Noa found financial records that were intentionally hid and deleted. Yuuka was even surprised by this. After recovering and tracking, Yuuka found a fortress city named "Eridu", which was said to be built by the President. Yuuka sent the location and apologized for not being able to help due to their stance.
desc.jp: As Sensei expected, Yuuka and Noa found financial records that were intentionally hid and deleted. Yuuka was even surprised by this. After recovering and tracking, Yuuka found a fortress city named "Eridu", which was said to be built by the President. Yuuka sent the location and apologized for not being able to help due to their stance.
desc.zh_cn: 不出老师所料，优香和乃爱找到了被刻意隐藏和删除的财务记录，就连优香都对此表示惊叹。在恢复并追踪去向后，优香找到了一个叫做“埃里都”的要塞都市，据称正是会长所建。优香将坐标发送给众人，并表示自己所处的立场不好给予更多协助后匆匆离开。

desc.en: The Engineering Department believed that the construction materials of the city should be sent from the Millennium, so it is only necessary to find the unmanned transport vehicles heading to the city and replace them with goods. Sensei wondered why the Engineering Department would be willing to participate in this matter, and Utaha said that the "Sword of Light" that the president took away from Aris was already exceeding his authority. In a sense, it was a declaration of war on them.
desc.jp: The Engineering Department believed that the construction materials of the city should be sent from the Millennium, so it is only necessary to find the unmanned transport vehicles heading to the city and replace them with goods. Sensei wondered why the Engineering Department would be willing to participate in this matter, and Utaha said that the "Sword of Light" that the president took away from Aris was already exceeding his authority. In a sense, it was a declaration of war on them.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 工程部认为都市的建造原料应该是从千禧年本地发出，因而只要找到前往都市的无人运送车，将他们置换成货物装进去即可。老师好奇工程部为何会愿意参与此事，歌原则表示会长带走爱丽丝的“光之剑”本身已属越权，某种意义上属于对工程部宣战。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 工程师部认为都市的建造原料应该是从千年本地发出，因而只要找到前往都市的无人运送车，将他们置换成货物装进去即可。老师好奇工程师部为何会愿意参与此事，咏叶则表示会长带走爱丽丝的“光之剑”本身已属越权，某种意义上属于对工程师部宣战。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 工程部认为都市的建造原料应该是从千年本地发出，因而只要找到前往都市的无人运送车，将他们置换成货物装进去即可。老师好奇工程部为何会愿意参与此事，歌原则表示会长带走爱丽丝的“光之剑”本身已属越权，某种意义上属于对工程部宣战。

desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green

desc.en: As the infiltration plan settled, the combat and rescue operations were back on the table. Midori and Yuzu described the situation at the time briefly, saying Toki was as fast and agile as a "cheater". Neru put forward a battle plan, rarely, saying that since the main goal was to rescue Aris, then it would be up to them to attract fires, so that the GDD and the Engineering Department can take that opportunity to rescue. Veritas said they would provide communication support on the back.
desc.jp: As the infiltration plan settled, the combat and rescue operations were back on the table. Midori and Yuzu described the situation at the time briefly, saying Toki was as fast and agile as a "cheater". Neru put forward a battle plan, rarely, saying that since the main goal was to rescue Aris, then it would be up to them to attract fires, so that the GDD and the Engineering Department can take that opportunity to rescue. Veritas said they would provide communication support on the back.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 解决了潜入问题，战斗和救援行动又重新摆上台面来。绿和柚子简单讲述了时当时的情况，表示就像“作弊玩家”一样快和敏捷。尼禄罕见地提出了作战计划，表示既然主要目标就是将爱丽丝救出，那么由她们去吸引火力，游戏开发部和工程部趁机救出即可。真理社则表示会在后方提供通讯支援。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 解决了潜入问题，战斗和救援行动又重新摆上台面来。绿和柚子简单讲述了季当时的情况，表示就像“作弊玩家”一样快和敏捷。宁瑠罕见地提出了作战计划，表示既然主要目标就是将爱丽丝救出，那么由她们去吸引火力，游戏开发部和工程师部趁机救出即可。贝里塔斯则表示会在后方提供通讯支援。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 解决了潜入问题，战斗和救援行动又重新摆上台面来。绿和柚子简单讲述了时当时的情况，表示就像“作弊玩家”一样快和敏捷。妮露罕见地提出了作战计划，表示既然主要目标就是将爱丽丝救出，那么由她们去吸引火力，游戏开发部和工程部趁机救出即可。真理会则表示会在后方提供通讯支援。

desc.en: Himari is imprisoned by Rio, and the two are still unable to find common ground. Meanwhile, after infiltrating Eridu to rescue Aris, the Game Development Department and the Engineering Department encounter an AMAS built by Rio.
desc.jp: Himari is imprisoned by Rio, and the two are still unable to find common ground. Meanwhile, after infiltrating Eridu to rescue Aris, the Game Development Department and the Engineering Department encounter an AMAS built by Rio.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 被莉央监禁的日鞠。两人依旧走在平行在线。另一方面，潜入埃里都拯救爱丽丝的游戏开发部和工程部遇见了莉央创造的AMAS。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 被莉音监禁的阳葵。两人依旧走在平行在线。另一方面，潜入埃里都拯救爱丽丝的游戏开发部和工程师部遇见了莉音创造的AMAS。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 被莉央监禁的日鞠。两人依旧走在平行在线。另一方面，潜入埃里都拯救爱丽丝的游戏开发部和工程部遇见了莉央创造的AMAS。

desc.en: The C&C members blast their way through the AMAS as planned, but their relentless determination is stopped by none other than the C&C's fifth member, Toki.
desc.jp: The C&C members blast their way through the AMAS as planned, but their relentless determination is stopped by none other than the C&C's fifth member, Toki.
desc.zh_cn_jp: C&C的成员们依照作战华丽地击倒了AMAS。C&C的第五个成员时阻止了势如破竹的他们。
desc.zh_cn_tw: C&C的成员们依照作战华丽地击倒了AMAS。C&C的第五个成员季阻止了势如破竹的他们。
desc.zh_cn_cn: C&C的成员们依照作战华丽地击倒了AMAS。C&C的第五个成员时阻止了势如破竹的他们。

desc.en: Himari was sick of the fact that Rio kidnapped Aris just to destroy her halo. Rio still hoped that Himari could understand her, and said it does no difference for her however they resist. Meantime, the security system of the city had discovered Sensei and the others.
desc.jp: Himari was sick of the fact that Rio kidnapped Aris just to destroy her halo. Rio still hoped that Himari could understand her, and said it does no difference for her however they resist. Meantime, the security system of the city had discovered Sensei and the others.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 日鞠对莉央将爱丽丝绑架回来并破坏光环一事感到恶心。莉央则仍希望日鞠能理解她，并表示日鞠和老师等人的反抗毫无意义。通讯间隙，都市的检测系统已经发现了老师一行人。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 阳葵对莉音将爱丽丝绑架回来并破坏光环一事感到恶心。莉音则仍希望阳葵能理解她，并表示阳葵和老师等人的反抗毫无意义。通讯间隙，都市的检测系统已经发现了老师一行人。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 日鞠对莉央将爱丽丝绑架回来并破坏光环一事感到恶心。莉央则仍希望日鞠能理解她，并表示日鞠和老师等人的反抗毫无意义。通讯间隙，都市的检测系统已经发现了老师一行人。

hobby.zh_cn_jp: 确认今日运势、一切神秘事物
hobby.zh_cn_tw: 确认今天的运势、所有的神秘事物
hobby.zh_cn_cn: 确认今日运势、一切神秘事物

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.jp: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

desc.en: The Engineering Department, Game Development Department and Sensei arrived at the city's underground freight passage safely, and was surprised to witness the ability that Veritas possessed. Right at this moment a group of AMAS blocked their way and they started engaging.
desc.jp: The Engineering Department, Game Development Department and Sensei arrived at the city's underground freight passage safely, and was surprised to witness the ability that Veritas possessed. Right at this moment a group of AMAS blocked their way and they started engaging.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 工程部、游戏开发部和老师安全抵达都市的地下货运通道，对真理社的黑客技术大为震撼。这时一群AMAS机器人挡住了他们的去路，众人立刻开始迎战。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 工程师部、游戏开发部和老师安全抵达都市的地下货运通道，对贝里塔斯的黑客技术大为震撼。这时一群AMAS机器人挡住了他们的去路，众人立刻开始迎战。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 工程部、游戏开发部和老师安全抵达都市的地下货运通道，对真理会的黑客技术大为震撼。这时一群AMAS机器人挡住了他们的去路，众人立刻开始迎战。

desc.en: Contrary to Toki's prediction that Neru would try to rescue Aris on her own, she is faced with the whole of C&C in a ferocious battle. Meanwhile, the Game Development Department blasts their way through every AMAS one by one while making their way to the tower where Aris is located.
desc.jp: Contrary to Toki's prediction that Neru would try to rescue Aris on her own, she is faced with the whole of C&C in a ferocious battle. Meanwhile, the Game Development Department blasts their way through every AMAS one by one while making their way to the tower where Aris is located.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 时原以为尼禄会独自去拯救爱丽丝，包含尼禄在内的所有C&C成员都开始和时交战。游戏开发部一一击败了AMAS的成员，并且前往埃里都的中心。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 季原以为宁瑠会独自去拯救爱丽丝，包含宁瑠在内的所有C&C成员都开始和季交战。游戏开发部一一击败了AMAS的成员，并且前往埃里都的中心。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 时原以为妮露会独自去拯救爱丽丝，包含妮露在内的所有C&C成员都开始和时交战。游戏开发部一一击败了AMAS的成员，并且前往埃里都的中心。

desc.en: Toki said she had already known the plan and advised them not to resist anyone. But C&C pretended not understanding it and continued attacking. Between the gaps, Toki explained C&C's operation plan arrogantly, believing that Neru would be with Sensei; but it was far away from the fact.
desc.jp: Toki said she had already known the plan and advised them not to resist anyone. But C&C pretended not understanding it and continued attacking. Between the gaps, Toki explained C&C's operation plan arrogantly, believing that Neru would be with Sensei; but it was far away from the fact.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 时表示自己已经完全掌握了老师和C&C这边的行动，奉劝C&C不要再做无谓抵抗。但C&C佯装不懂，继续发起攻击。间隙，时傲慢地向C&C解析了他们的行动计划，认为尼禄会随老师一起；但这并非事实。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 季表示自己已经完全掌握了老师和C&C这边的行动，奉劝C&C不要再做无谓抵抗。但C&C佯装不懂，继续发起攻击。间隙，季傲慢地向C&C解析了他们的行动计划，认为宁瑠会随老师一起；但这并非事实。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 时表示自己已经完全掌握了老师和C&C这边的行动，奉劝C&C不要再做无谓抵抗。但C&C佯装不懂，继续发起攻击。间隙，时傲慢地向C&C解析了他们的行动计划，认为妮露会随老师一起；但这并非事实。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: After finally managing to drive off Toki, the C&C and the Game Development Department gather together in front of the Tower of Eridu. However, Toki reappears before them and summons the decisive weapon, Abi-Eshuh, at Rio's behest.
desc.jp: After finally managing to drive off Toki, the C&C and the Game Development Department gather together in front of the Tower of Eridu. However, Toki reappears before them and summons the decisive weapon, Abi-Eshuh, at Rio's behest.
desc.zh_cn_jp: C&C的成员以超乎预期的活跃表现击退了时，游戏开发部终于聚集在埃里都的中央之塔前。但时再次现身，他在莉央的许可下启动了决战兵器「Abi-Eshuh」。
desc.zh_cn_tw: C&C的成员以超乎预期的活跃表现击退了季，游戏开发部终于聚集在埃里都的中央之塔前。但季再次现身，他在莉音的许可下启动了决战兵器「Abi-Eshuh」。
desc.zh_cn_cn: C&C的成员以超乎预期的活跃表现击退了时，游戏开发部终于聚集在埃里都的中央之塔前。但时再次现身，他在莉央的许可下启动了决战兵器「Abi-Eshuh」。

desc.en: Neru was entangled with Toki. Toki found that Neru was no easy opponent and was surprised to see that much of Neru's actions had escaped the calculations - the data kept updating in real time and barely usable. Meanwhile, other members escaped the maze set by Toki and joined the combat. Rio instructed Toki to retreat temporally. As Toki went nowhere, C&C decided to assemble with Sensei first.
desc.jp: Neru was entangled with Toki. Toki found that Neru was no easy opponent and was surprised to see that much of Neru's actions had escaped the calculations - the data kept updating in real time and barely usable. Meanwhile, other members escaped the maze set by Toki and joined the combat. Rio instructed Toki to retreat temporally. As Toki went nowhere, C&C decided to assemble with Sensei first.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 时与尼禄纠缠着。时发现尼禄并非一个容易对付的对手，并惊讶的发现尼禄的很多都逃脱了计算，数据基本上是实时更新而几乎无法使用。与此同时，C&C的其他成员也从时设下的迷宫中走出，加入战斗。莉央此时指示时暂时撤退。因为时跑掉了，C&C决定先与老师集合。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 季与宁瑠纠缠着。季发现宁瑠并非一个容易对付的对手，并惊讶的发现宁瑠的很多都逃脱了计算，数据基本上是实时更新而几乎无法使用。与此同时，C&C的其他成员也从季设下的迷宫中走出，加入战斗。莉音此时指示季暂时撤退。因为季跑掉了，C&C决定先与老师集合。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 时与妮露纠缠着。时发现妮露并非一个容易对付的对手，并惊讶的发现妮露的很多都逃脱了计算，数据基本上是实时更新而几乎无法使用。与此同时，C&C的其他成员也从时设下的迷宫中走出，加入战斗。莉央此时指示时暂时撤退。因为时跑掉了，C&C决定先与老师集合。

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.jp: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

desc.en: With Chihiro's guidance, the GDD arrived at the entrance of the tower and met the C&C.
desc.jp: With Chihiro's guidance, the GDD arrived at the entrance of the tower and met the C&C.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 在千寻的指引下，游戏开发部一行人顺利来到了中心高塔的入口，正好遇到同样前来的C&C。两队间交换了下具体情况。老师向千寻再次确认情报的准确性，但此刻时突然再次现身。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 在千寻的指引下，游戏开发部一行人顺利来到了中心高塔的入口，正好遇到同样前来的C&C。两队间交换了下具体情况。老师向千寻再次确认情报的准确性，但此刻季突然再次现身。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 在千寻的指引下，游戏开发部一行人顺利来到了中心高塔的入口，正好遇到同样前来的C&C。两队间交换了下具体情况。老师向千寻再次确认情报的准确性，但此刻时突然再次现身。

desc.en: The two teams exchanged a few. Sensei confirmed the situation with Chihiro, but Toki appeared at this moment.
desc.jp: The two teams exchanged a few. Sensei confirmed the situation with Chihiro, but Toki appeared at this moment.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央表示他们已经改变了计划，允许时使用Abi-Eshuh，一套外骨骼机甲。机甲应声从天而降，时也熟练地进入了机甲，启动了系统。C&C立刻开始应敌。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音表示他们已经改变了计划，允许季使用Abi-Eshuh，一套外骨骼机甲。机甲应声从天而降，季也熟练地进入了机甲，启动了系统。C&C立刻开始应敌。

desc.en: Toki said they had already changed the plan, allowing Toki to use Abi-Eshuh, an exoskeleton suit. It fell from the sky, and Toki entered it like nothing. Toki started the system, and C&C began to engage.

desc.zh_cn: 【不是谁受得了这种从天而降的机甲啊，超帅的好吗！】

desc.en: The situation seems hopeless and everyone's morale has hit rock bottom. Yuzu, who had been carefully observing the battle between Neru and Toki, proposes a way to neutralize Abi-Eshuh.
desc.jp: The situation seems hopeless and everyone's morale has hit rock bottom. Yuzu, who had been carefully observing the battle between Neru and Toki, proposes a way to neutralize Abi-Eshuh.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 情况陷入绝望。正当大家灰心丧气之际，仔细观察尼禄与时战斗的柚子挺身而出，提出能让「Abi-Eshuh」失去作用的方法。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 情况陷入绝望。正当大家灰心丧气之际，仔细观察宁瑠与季战斗的柚子挺身而出，提出能让「Abi-Eshuh」失去作用的方法。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 情况陷入绝望。正当大家灰心丧气之际，仔细观察妮露与时战斗的柚子挺身而出，提出能让「Abi-Eshuh」失去作用的方法。

desc.en: All retreated into a closer building. Chihiro summarized the current situation: the C&C were not strong enough (with Neru still in coma), the Engineering Department were exhausted, and the combat power of GDD could not even be counted. Everyone thought believed that every method had been used, and the "bad ending", as Midori suggested, had arrived.
desc.jp: All retreated into a closer building. Chihiro summarized the current situation: the C&C were not strong enough (with Neru still in coma), the Engineering Department were exhausted, and the combat power of GDD could not even be counted. Everyone thought believed that every method had been used, and the "bad ending", as Midori suggested, had arrived.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 所有人撤退到了一幢较近的建筑物中。千寻总结，C&C还不够强，而且尼禄尚且仍在昏迷，工程部已经累趴下了，而游戏开发部的战力甚至算不上什么。大家都认为一切方法已经耗尽，所有人最不想见到的“Bad Ending”，如绿所言，已然到来。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 所有人撤退到了一幢较近的建筑物中。千寻总结，C&C还不够强，而且宁瑠尚且仍在昏迷，工程师部已经累趴下了，而游戏开发部的战力甚至算不上什么。大家都认为一切方法已经耗尽，所有人最不想见到的“Bad Ending”，如绿所言，已然到来。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 所有人撤退到了一幢较近的建筑物中。千寻总结，C&C还不够强，而且妮露尚且仍在昏迷，工程部已经累趴下了，而游戏开发部的战力甚至算不上什么。大家都认为一切方法已经耗尽，所有人最不想见到的“Bad Ending”，如绿所言，已然到来。

desc.en: Hearing "Bad Ending", Neru suddenly woke up. Neru steadied herself and demanded an answer from GDD, "Is that all you got to rescue Aris?" Though serverly injured, she said she was on the same boat with others, and should not waste this opportunity. When Momoi asked how to actually make it, Yuzu reported her discovery.
desc.jp: Hearing "Bad Ending", Neru suddenly woke up. Neru steadied herself and demanded an answer from GDD, "Is that all you got to rescue Aris?" Though serverly injured, she said she was on the same boat with others, and should not waste this opportunity. When Momoi asked how to actually make it, Yuzu reported her discovery.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 尼禄一听“Bad Ending”突然就醒了过来。尼禄强行支撑着，质问游戏开发部的人“就只有这点决心吗”，表示虽然受重伤，但同大家一样，不能就此放弃、白费。而当桃井问出要如何应对时的时候，柚子讲述了自己的发现。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 宁瑠一听“Bad Ending”突然就醒了过来。宁瑠强行支撑着，质问游戏开发部的人“就只有这点决心吗”，表示虽然受重伤，但同大家一样，不能就此放弃、白费。而当桃井问出要如何应对季的时候，柚子讲述了自己的发现。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 妮露一听“Bad Ending”突然就醒了过来。妮露强行支撑着，质问游戏开发部的人“就只有这点决心吗”，表示虽然受重伤，但同大家一样，不能就此放弃、白费。而当桃问出要如何应对时的时候，柚子讲述了自己的发现。

desc.en: Yuzu was convinced that Neru did inflict damage on Toki. Chihiro pointed out the Toki's suit didn't seem to be functioning well when calculating the parameters of both the fall and the attack. Yuzu asked whether Neru was at her best in close combat; Neru replied yes, and Yuzu then formed a plan - with the usage of the "tricks."
desc.jp: Yuzu was convinced that Neru did inflict damage on Toki. Chihiro pointed out the Toki's suit didn't seem to be functioning well when calculating the parameters of both the fall and the attack. Yuzu asked whether Neru was at her best in close combat; Neru replied yes, and Yuzu then formed a plan - with the usage of the "tricks."
desc.zh_cn_jp: 柚子确信尼禄对时造成了伤害。千寻指出，时的机甲似乎无法同时计算坠落时的参数与攻击参数，此时便出现了破绽。柚子询问尼禄是否是在近距离作战时最优，尼禄表达了肯定，而柚子则有了个计划——他们可以用“套路”。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 柚子确信宁瑠对季造成了伤害。千寻指出，季的机甲似乎无法同时计算坠落时的参数与攻击参数，此时便出现了破绽。柚子询问宁瑠是否是在近距离作战时最优，宁瑠表达了肯定，而柚子则有了个计划——他们可以用“套路”。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 柚子确信妮露对时造成了伤害。千寻指出，时的机甲似乎无法同时计算坠落时的参数与攻击参数，此时便出现了破绽。柚子询问妮露是否是在近距离作战时最优，妮露表达了肯定，而柚子则有了个计划——他们可以用“套路”。

desc.en: All returned to the entrance and found Toki and Rio were waiting for them. Neru announced that she would eventually settle it down.
desc.jp: All returned to the entrance and found Toki and Rio were waiting for them. Neru announced that she would eventually settle it down.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 一行人重新回到了现场，发现时和莉央早已恭候多时。尼禄表示这次一定会做个了断。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 一行人重新回到了现场，发现季和莉音早已恭候多时。宁瑠表示这次一定会做个了断。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 一行人重新回到了现场，发现时和莉央早已恭候多时。妮露表示这次一定会做个了断。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.

desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。
等下，接下来要发生什么？！举例：第137首曲子

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.jp: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

desc.en: Thanks to everyone's collaborative efforts, the students of Millennium successfully back Toki into a corner, and victory is secured due to "Double O" Neru's performance.
desc.jp: Thanks to everyone's collaborative efforts, the students of Millennium successfully back Toki into a corner, and victory is secured due to "Double O" Neru's performance.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 因为大家齐心协力的关系，千禧年的学生成功击败了时，代号Double O的尼禄的活跃表现也争取到了最后的胜利。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 因为大家齐心协力的关系，千年的学生成功击败了季，代号Double O的宁瑠的活跃表现也争取到了最后的胜利。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 因为大家齐心协力的关系，千年的学生成功击败了时，代号Double O的妮露的活跃表现也争取到了最后的胜利。

desc.en: C&C continued the fight with Toki's suit. Toki started out being very confident, but soon she discovered that her attacks seemed to be ineffective as well. C&C began to organize the battle with intution, and finally forced Toki into the building.
desc.jp: C&C continued the fight with Toki's suit. Toki started out being very confident, but soon she discovered that her attacks seemed to be ineffective as well. C&C began to organize the battle with intution, and finally forced Toki into the building.
desc.zh_cn_jp: C&C一行人继续与时和她的机甲战斗。时起初非常自信，但很快发现自己的攻击似乎也开始无效化。C&C开始以直觉统筹战斗，最终将时逼进了室内。
desc.zh_cn_tw: C&C一行人继续与季和她的机甲战斗。季起初非常自信，但很快发现自己的攻击似乎也开始无效化。C&C开始以直觉统筹战斗，最终将季逼进了室内。
desc.zh_cn_cn: C&C一行人继续与时和她的机甲战斗。时起初非常自信，但很快发现自己的攻击似乎也开始无效化。C&C开始以直觉统筹战斗，最终将时逼进了室内。

desc.en: Everyone expressed doubts about Yuzu's assumptions and plans. But Neru not only approved it, but also praised her brave courage in saving her friends. Akane worried about the Neru's injuries, but the latter said she could make it through sheer perseverance. In the end everyone agreed.
desc.jp: Everyone expressed doubts about Yuzu's assumptions and plans. But Neru not only approved it, but also praised her brave courage in saving her friends. Akane worried about the Neru's injuries, but the latter said she could make it through sheer perseverance. In the end everyone agreed.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 众人都对柚子的假设与计划表示怀疑，但尼禄不仅表示了肯定，而且还夸赞了她曾经为救朋友所表现出的无谓气魄。茜担心尼禄身上的伤，但后者表示单靠毅力就能支撑。最终所有人同意此次作战。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 众人都对柚子的假设与计划表示怀疑，但宁瑠不仅表示了肯定，而且还夸赞了她曾经为救朋友所表现出的无谓气魄。朱音担心宁瑠身上的伤，但后者表示单靠毅力就能支撑。最终所有人同意此次作战。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 众人都对柚子的假设与计划表示怀疑，但妮露不仅表示了肯定，而且还夸赞了她曾经为救朋友所表现出的无谓气魄。茜担心妮露身上的伤，但后者表示单靠毅力就能支撑。最终所有人同意此次作战。

desc.en: Rio was very confused by the Sensei's strategy, but soon realized what it was. Rio authorized Toki to fire the main gun to knock down Neru. Dust settled, even Rio was surprised by her own irrational choice, but still claimed that the probability of Sensei's winning was nearly zero. She also didn't understand why anyone would keep fighting with that in mind, but Akane explained it clear and loud: Sensei never, and ever, talked about the probability of winning.
desc.jp: Rio was very confused by the Sensei's strategy, but soon realized what it was. Rio authorized Toki to fire the main gun to knock down Neru. Dust settled, even Rio was surprised by her own irrational choice, but still claimed that the probability of Sensei's winning was nearly zero. She also didn't understand why anyone would keep fighting with that in mind, but Akane explained it clear and loud: Sensei never, and ever, talked about the probability of winning.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央对老师的策略感到非常迷惑，但很快意识到了什么。莉央授权时发射主炮，将尼禄打倒。尘埃落定，就连莉央也对自己非理性的选择感到惊讶，并且同时继续嘴硬声称老师成功的概率为零，并对所有人在此种条件下仍继续作战感到不解。茜则解释称，老师从来，以及他们作战，从来就没有谈过胜率云云。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音对老师的策略感到非常迷惑，但很快意识到了什么。莉音授权季发射主炮，将宁瑠打倒。尘埃落定，就连莉音也对自己非理性的选择感到惊讶，并且同时继续嘴硬声称老师成功的概率为零，并对所有人在此种条件下仍继续作战感到不解。朱音则解释称，老师从来，以及他们作战，从来就没有谈过胜率云云。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉央对老师的策略感到非常迷惑，但很快意识到了什么。莉央授权时发射主炮，将妮露打倒。尘埃落定，就连莉央也对自己非理性的选择感到惊讶，并且同时继续嘴硬声称老师成功的概率为零，并对所有人在此种条件下仍继续作战感到不解。茜则解释称，老师从来，以及他们作战，从来就没有谈过胜率云云。

desc.en: Akane was still very worried about Neru's physical conditions, but Neru simply didn't care. All she wanted is to rescue Aris - and when Aris' rescued, they won. Akane was surprised by this, but expressed her understanding, saying they were just like "the protagonists in a game". Akane also mentioned that Neru had a code name "OO" as well - a victory symbol for Millennium - as well.
desc.jp: Akane was still very worried about Neru's physical conditions, but Neru simply didn't care. All she wanted is to rescue Aris - and when Aris' rescued, they won. Akane was surprised by this, but expressed her understanding, saying they were just like "the protagonists in a game". Akane also mentioned that Neru had a code name "OO" as well - a victory symbol for Millennium - as well.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 茜仍然对尼禄的身体状况非常担心，表示千寻说的“胜率很低”的确没错。但尼禄并不管这些，她只想救出爱丽丝——而且只要能救出就是胜利。茜对此感到惊讶，不过表示理解，并且表示他们“就好像游戏的主人公一样”。茜同时还向莉央提到，尼禄可是有代号为“OO”——千禧年象征胜利的——这样的称呼。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 朱音仍然对宁瑠的身体状况非常担心，表示千寻说的“胜率很低”的确没错。但宁瑠并不管这些，她只想救出爱丽丝——而且只要能救出就是胜利。朱音对此感到惊讶，不过表示理解，并且表示他们“就好像游戏的主人公一样”。朱音同时还向莉音提到，宁瑠可是有代号为“OO”——千年象征胜利的——这样的称呼。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 茜仍然对妮露的身体状况非常担心，表示千寻说的“胜率很低”的确没错。但妮露并不管这些，她只想救出爱丽丝——而且只要能救出就是胜利。茜对此感到惊讶，不过表示理解，并且表示他们“就好像游戏的主人公一样”。茜同时还向莉央提到，妮露可是有代号为“OO”——千年象征胜利的——这样的称呼。

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: Neru got up from the ground, while Veritas had successfully hacked the freight elevator. They forced Toki into the elevator - a thing that Momoi had talked before. It was only then that Rio realized their plan - to use the elevator to ineffective the system - but was too late. With the acceleration speed of 10x the gravity, Toki was no way winning. Rio was impressed by "OO".
desc.jp: Neru got up from the ground, while Veritas had successfully hacked the freight elevator. They forced Toki into the elevator - a thing that Momoi had talked before. It was only then that Rio realized their plan - to use the elevator to ineffective the system - but was too late. With the acceleration speed of 10x the gravity, Toki was no way winning. Rio was impressed by "OO".
desc.zh_cn_jp: 尼禄从地上爬起，真理社也已经成功骇入货梯。众人将时逼进货梯——正是桃井曾提出的游戏方案。这时莉央才意识到了众人的计划——用电梯来压制系统——但为时已晚。在真理社特别设定的十倍重力加速度下，时和她的机甲直接被吊打。莉央感慨“OO”的强大。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 宁瑠从地上爬起，贝里塔斯也已经成功骇入货梯。众人将季逼进货梯——正是桃井曾提出的游戏方案。这时莉音才意识到了众人的计划——用电梯来压制系统——但为时已晚。在贝里塔斯特别设定的十倍重力加速度下，季和她的机甲直接被吊打。莉音感慨“OO”的强大。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 妮露从地上爬起，真理会也已经成功骇入货梯。众人将时逼进货梯——正是桃曾提出的游戏方案。这时莉央才意识到了众人的计划——用电梯来压制系统——但为时已晚。在真理会特别设定的十倍重力加速度下，时和她的机甲直接被吊打。莉央感慨“OO”的强大。

desc.en: The Game Development Department successfully restrain Key with Yuuka and Noa's assistance. As the Game Development Department and Veritas fend off the enemies that are crawling out of the woodwork, Himari helps Momoi, Midori, Yuzu, and Sensei enter Aris' headspace to try to wake her.
desc.jp: The Game Development Department successfully restrain Key with Yuuka and Noa's assistance. As the Game Development Department and Veritas fend off the enemies that are crawling out of the woodwork, Himari helps Momoi, Midori, Yuzu, and Sensei enter Aris' headspace to try to wake her.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 在优香和乃爱的协助下，游戏开发部成功抓住了「Key」。另外，正当工程部和真理社等抵御来自各地的敌人之际。桃井、绿、柚子、老师企图在日鞠的协助下唤醒爱丽丝，于是便进入了爱丽丝的精神世界。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 在优香和乃爱的协助下，游戏开发部成功抓住了「Key」。另外，正当工程师部和贝里塔斯等抵御来自各地的敌人之际。桃井、绿、柚子、老师企图在阳葵的协助下唤醒爱丽丝，于是便进入了爱丽丝的精神世界。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 在优香和乃爱的协助下，游戏开发部成功抓住了「Key」。另外，正当工程部和真理会等抵御来自各地的敌人之际。桃、绿、柚子、老师企图在日鞠的协助下唤醒爱丽丝，于是便进入了爱丽丝的精神世界。

desc.en: Noa explained that Yuuka didn't feel well after the conversation and decided to intervene and help. Yuuka lectured Rio, saying that she would be held accountable severely. The Engineering Department was ready at then, bringing the modified Avant Guard to join in the battle. Key restarted system and began to re-secure resources, gathering troops to the central tower; but they were interfered by Avant Guard and the Engineering Department.
desc.jp: Noa explained that Yuuka didn't feel well after the conversation and decided to intervene and help. Yuuka lectured Rio, saying that she would be held accountable severely. The Engineering Department was ready at then, bringing the modified Avant Guard to join in the battle. Key restarted system and began to re-secure resources, gathering troops to the central tower; but they were interfered by Avant Guard and the Engineering Department.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 乃爱解释称，优香觉得不插手总感觉哪里不对，于是前来协助。优香呵斥了莉央，说明会严厉追究她的责任。工程部此时也准备就绪，带上了改装好的前卫君MK.2前来协助。Key重启系统，开始重新确保资源并将兵力向中心高塔聚集，受到前卫君和工程部干扰。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 乃爱解释称，优香觉得不插手总感觉哪里不对，于是前来协助。优香呵斥了莉音，说明会严厉追究她的责任。工程师部此时也准备就绪，带上了改装好的前卫君MK.2前来协助。Key重启系统，开始重新确保资源并将兵力向中心高塔聚集，受到前卫君和工程师部干扰。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 乃爱解释称，优香觉得不插手总感觉哪里不对，于是前来协助。优香呵斥了莉央，说明会严厉追究她的责任。工程部此时也准备就绪，带上了改装好的前卫君MK.2前来协助。Key重启系统，开始重新确保资源并将兵力向中心高塔聚集，受到前卫君和工程部干扰。

name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

desc.en: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.jp: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.zh_cn: Key是爱丽丝数据库中的另一个人格，其最先是用来指引“王女”（即爱丽丝）摧毁基沃托斯的存在。在主线第二篇中，Key在与Divi:Sion军队的残骸触碰后被激活；在最终章中，爱丽丝向Key请求帮助，但过程中却被摧毁，Key一命换一命，将爱丽丝复活。已知的最后一份拷贝存储在桃井承载着G.BIBLE的游戏机上，但在经历这么多事件后，G.BIBLE出于未知状态。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.

蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

desc.en: When Key still thought she had a chance, Himari appeared suddenly. She said that C&C and Eimi had long been blocking the entrance, and there would be no chance for Key to assemble troops in the tower. Rio was surprised that Himari hadn't escaped, and Himari said she had already anticipated such events.
desc.jp: When Key still thought she had a chance, Himari appeared suddenly. She said that C&C and Eimi had long been blocking the entrance, and there would be no chance for Key to assemble troops in the tower. Rio was surprised that Himari hadn't escaped, and Himari said she had already anticipated such events.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 在Key以为仍有机会时，日鞠突然出现并解释C&C和英美已经将入口堵上，Key无法召集兵力进入高塔。莉央惊讶于日鞠竟未逃走，而日鞠则表示早已对此有所预料。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 在Key以为仍有机会时，阳葵突然出现并解释C&C和英美已经将入口堵上，Key无法召集兵力进入高塔。莉音惊讶于阳葵竟未逃走，而阳葵则表示早已对此有所预料。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 在Key以为仍有机会时，日鞠突然出现并解释C&C和英美已经将入口堵上，Key无法召集兵力进入高塔。莉央惊讶于日鞠竟未逃走，而日鞠则表示早已对此有所预料。

desc.en: Himari made it clear that under current situation, it is possible that Key would eventually take over Aris' personality. Therefore, the best solution now should be waking Aris up. When asked how, Himari purposed that the GDD and Sensei shall dive into the machine's consciousness and databases, and bring Aris back at there. Rio pointed out the potential dangers in it, but no one was backing away. Under the protection of almost all effectives from Millennium, Himari started looking for a break through.
desc.jp: Himari made it clear that under current situation, it is possible that Key would eventually take over Aris' personality. Therefore, the best solution now should be waking Aris up. When asked how, Himari purposed that the GDD and Sensei shall dive into the machine's consciousness and databases, and bring Aris back at there. Rio pointed out the potential dangers in it, but no one was backing away. Under the protection of almost all effectives from Millennium, Himari started looking for a break through.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 日鞠指出在当前状态下Key有可能会彻底接管爱丽丝的人格，因而目前的最佳方案应当是将爱丽丝唤醒。至于如何唤醒，日鞠提出让游戏开发部和老师一起潜入机器的意识和数据库中，在那找回爱丽丝。莉央指出了其中的危险，但众人义无反顾；在千禧年几乎全部有生作战力量的保护下，日鞠开始寻找其中的突破口。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 阳葵指出在当前状态下Key有可能会彻底接管爱丽丝的人格，因而目前的最佳方案应当是将爱丽丝唤醒。至于如何唤醒，阳葵提出让游戏开发部和老师一起潜入机器的意识和数据库中，在那找回爱丽丝。莉音指出了其中的危险，但众人义无反顾；在千年几乎全部有生作战力量的保护下，阳葵开始寻找其中的突破口。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 日鞠指出在当前状态下Key有可能会彻底接管爱丽丝的人格，因而目前的最佳方案应当是将爱丽丝唤醒。至于如何唤醒，日鞠提出让游戏开发部和老师一起潜入机器的意识和数据库中，在那找回爱丽丝。莉央指出了其中的危险，但众人义无反顾；在千年几乎全部有生作战力量的保护下，日鞠开始寻找其中的突破口。

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.jp: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

desc.en: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.jp: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.zh_cn: Key是爱丽丝数据库中的另一个人格，其最先是用来指引“王女”（即爱丽丝）摧毁基沃托斯的存在。在主线第二篇中，Key在与Divi:Sion军队的残骸触碰后被激活；在最终章中，爱丽丝向Key请求帮助，但过程中却被摧毁，Key一命换一命，将爱丽丝复活。已知的最后一份拷贝存储在桃井承载着G.BIBLE的游戏机上，但在经历这么多事件后，G.BIBLE出于未知状态。

desc.en: The situation is finally resolved. Rio vanishes, the C&C welcomes a new member, and the Game Development Department resumes development of their new project. Peace returns to Millennium.
desc.jp: The situation is finally resolved. Rio vanishes, the C&C welcomes a new member, and the Game Development Department resumes development of their new project. Peace returns to Millennium.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 事情告一段落。莉央消失不见，C&C则迎接新成员，游戏开发部再次开始研发下一部作品。千禧年再次恢复和平的日常生活。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 事情告一段落。莉音消失不见，C&C则迎接新成员，游戏开发部再次开始研发下一部作品。千年再次恢复和平的日常生活。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 事情告一段落。莉央消失不见，C&C则迎接新成员，游戏开发部再次开始研发下一部作品。千年再次恢复和平的日常生活。

desc.en: Himari said that the Eridu City had been sealed and the things afterwards would be handled by her.
desc.jp: Himari said that the Eridu City had been sealed and the things afterwards would be handled by her.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 日鞠向老师表示，埃里都已经封存，后事将由她进行负责。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: Sensei was called by the Game Development Department. The four said they were developing a new games, as they weren't able to come up more ideas for the old one. Aris invited Sensei to try with them, and everyone started the game happily. The story will go on and never stops.
desc.jp: Sensei was called by the Game Development Department. The four said they were developing a new games, as they weren't able to come up more ideas for the old one. Aris invited Sensei to try with them, and everyone started the game happily. The story will go on and never stops.
desc.zh_cn: 老师被叫到了游戏开发部，众人表示老师正在开发一款新的游戏，因为之前的那个无法继续扩展思路。爱丽丝邀请老师一起尝试，众人在愉快的氛围下开始了游戏。故事仍在续写中。

desc.en: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.jp: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第64首曲子，于“游戏开发部”相关章节中广泛使用。其已经成为游戏开发部及其成员实质上的标志性曲目。

desc.en: [An MV is playing in this part. The BGM was the ending song for the short animation "beautiful day dreamer" about the Game Development Department. Considering that most images in the videos are actually a part of the in-game backgrounds, therefore we'll be listing as much as backgrounds as we can.]
desc.jp: [An MV is playing in this part. The BGM was the ending song for the short animation "beautiful day dreamer" about the Game Development Department. Considering that most images in the videos are actually a part of the in-game backgrounds, therefore we'll be listing as much as backgrounds as we can.]
desc.zh_cn: 【此处为过场视频播放，背景音乐为游戏部短篇动画《beautiful day dreamer》的片尾曲。由于视频中的图片素材大多在游戏内存在，因而背景一栏将尽量给出具体的图片】

desc.en: The ending song of the short animation "beautiful day dreamer" about the Game Development Department, sung by the fours of the GDD. The song has two versions, one is two-minute long and the other one is four; the former is used at the end of both the animation and the Episode 25, Chapter 2, Volume 2 in-game.
desc.jp: The ending song of the short animation "beautiful day dreamer" about the Game Development Department, sung by the fours of the GDD. The song has two versions, one is two-minute long and the other one is four; the former is used at the end of both the animation and the Episode 25, Chapter 2, Volume 2 in-game.
desc.zh_cn: 官方游戏开发部短篇动画《beautiful day dreamer》中的片尾曲，由游戏开发部四人演唱。该歌曲由两分钟及四分钟两个版本，其中前者用于动画末尾曲与游戏内第二篇第二章的结尾曲。

desc.en: 三一的實現正義部部長弦生和千年的C&C的部長寧瑠發生了些口角。明日奈禍從口出，提到了“讓強的當前”，結果寧瑠決定與弦生比個高下。
desc.jp: 三一的實現正義部部長弦生和千年的C&C的部長寧瑠發生了些口角。明日奈禍從口出，提到了“讓強的當前”，結果寧瑠決定與弦生比個高下。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 崔尼蒂的正义实现部部长鹤城和千禧年的C&C的部长尼禄发生了些口角。明日奈祸从口出，提到了“让强的当前”，结果尼禄决定与鹤城比个高下。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 三一的实现正义部部长弦生和千年的C&C的部长宁瑠发生了些口角。明日奈祸从口出，提到了“让强的当前”，结果宁瑠决定与弦生比个高下。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 三一的正义实现委员会部长鹤城和千年的C&C的部长妮露发生了些口角。明日奈祸从口出，提到了“让强的当前”，结果妮露决定与鹤城比个高下。

desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: The 47th track in Blue Archive, a theme song for the Tea Party members and a notable song in Volume 3. It is often used with the related backgrounds.
desc.jp: The 47th track in Blue Archive, a theme song for the Tea Party members and a notable song in Volume 3. It is often used with the related backgrounds.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第四十七首曲子，茶会成员的主题曲，在第三篇故事中尤为明显。其亦与相关背景同时使用。

desc.en: 優香對這兩人居然因為分組而吵架而感到有些小震撼。在兩人不肯讓步的情況下，優香勒令兩人用猜拳的方式決定，否則計劃就要趕不上了。無奈，兩人只好以此決勝。
desc.jp: 優香對這兩人居然因為分組而吵架而感到有些小震撼。在兩人不肯讓步的情況下，優香勒令兩人用猜拳的方式決定，否則計劃就要趕不上了。無奈，兩人只好以此決勝。
desc.zh_cn: 优香对这两人居然因为分组而吵架而感到有些小震撼。在两人不肯让步的情况下，优香勒令两人用猜拳的方式决定，否则计划就要赶不上了。无奈，两人只好以此决胜。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: 千年的遊戲開發部、SRT的RABBIT小隊和風紀委員會的陽奈到達現場。陽奈對美優的狙擊能力感到讚歎；她也注意到了愛麗絲。
desc.jp: 千年的遊戲開發部、SRT的RABBIT小隊和風紀委員會的陽奈到達現場。陽奈對美優的狙擊能力感到讚歎；她也注意到了愛麗絲。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 千禧年的游戏开发部、SRT的RABBIT小队和风纪委员会的日奈到达现场。日奈对美游的狙击能力感到赞叹；她也注意到了爱丽丝。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 千年的游戏开发部、SRT的RABBIT小队和风纪委员会的阳奈到达现场。阳奈对美优的狙击能力感到赞叹；她也注意到了爱丽丝。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 千年的游戏开发部、SRT的RABBIT小队和风纪委员会的日奈到达现场。日奈对美游的狙击能力感到赞叹；她也注意到了爱丽丝。

desc.en: 愛麗絲主動與陽奈打招呼，並說老師曾提到陽奈是個很好的人，也是老師信賴的人――愛麗絲因此很榮幸能與她一起作戰。
desc.jp: 愛麗絲主動與陽奈打招呼，並說老師曾提到陽奈是個很好的人，也是老師信賴的人――愛麗絲因此很榮幸能與她一起作戰。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 爱丽丝主动与日奈打招呼，并说老师曾提到日奈是个很好的人，也是老师信赖的人――爱丽丝因此很荣幸能与她一起作战。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 爱丽丝主动与阳奈打招呼，并说老师曾提到阳奈是个很好的人，也是老师信赖的人――爱丽丝因此很荣幸能与她一起作战。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 爱丽丝主动与日奈打招呼，并说老师曾提到日奈是个很好的人，也是老师信赖的人――爱丽丝因此很荣幸能与她一起作战。

desc.en: 莉音和陽葵成功奪回生命守護者主艦的操控權，但季已經到極限了。救世主在危機的一刻出現了。
desc.jp: 莉音和陽葵成功奪回生命守護者主艦的操控權，但季已經到極限了。救世主在危機的一刻出現了。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央和日鞠成功夺回生命守护者主舰的操控权，但时已经到极限了。救世主在危机的一刻出现了。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音和阳葵成功夺回生命守护者主舰的操控权，但季已经到极限了。救世主在危机的一刻出现了。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉央和日鞠成功夺回生命守护者主舰的操控权，但时已经到极限了。救世主在危机的一刻出现了。

desc.en: 由於連線已經從物理上斷開，短時間內方舟將無法再駭入生命守護者。陽葵表示將重新設定安全系統，取回控制權，並要莉音要求季進行撤退。
desc.jp: 由於連線已經從物理上斷開，短時間內方舟將無法再駭入生命守護者。陽葵表示將重新設定安全系統，取回控制權，並要莉音要求季進行撤退。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 由于连接已经从物理上断开，短时间内方舟将无法再骇入生命守护者。日鞠表示将重新设置安全系统，取回控制权，并要莉央要求时进行撤退。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 由于连接已经从物理上断开，短时间内方舟将无法再骇入生命守护者。阳葵表示将重新设置安全系统，取回控制权，并要莉音要求季进行撤退。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 由于连接已经从物理上断开，短时间内方舟将无法再骇入生命守护者。日鞠表示将重新设置安全系统，取回控制权，并要莉央要求时进行撤退。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.jp: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.

desc.en: 季向莉音大人抱歉，並表示自己能與她共事是她極大的榮幸。季說她想和夏萊、和C&C的前輩們一起戰鬥——而她對此非常感激。她向莉音詢問Abi-Eshuh的自爆密碼，認為其能爆炸的能量應能徹底摧毀聖所——她覺得，以莉音的性格，應當會有此種保險措施以防她叛變，但莉音表示那不存在。
desc.jp: 季向莉音大人抱歉，並表示自己能與她共事是她極大的榮幸。季說她想和夏萊、和C&C的前輩們一起戰鬥——而她對此非常感激。她向莉音詢問Abi-Eshuh的自爆密碼，認為其能爆炸的能量應能徹底摧毀聖所——她覺得，以莉音的性格，應當會有此種保險措施以防她叛變，但莉音表示那不存在。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 时向莉央大人抱歉，并表示自己能与她共事是她极大的荣幸。时说她想和夏莱、和C&C的前辈们一起战斗——而她对此非常感激。她向莉央询问Abi-Eshuh的自爆密码，认为其能爆炸的能量应能彻底摧毁圣所——她觉得，以莉央的性格，应当会有此种保险措施以防她叛变，但莉央表示那不存在。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 季向莉音大人抱歉，并表示自己能与她共事是她极大的荣幸。季说她想和夏莱、和C&C的前辈们一起战斗——而她对此非常感激。她向莉音询问Abi-Eshuh的自爆密码，认为其能爆炸的能量应能彻底摧毁圣所——她觉得，以莉音的性格，应当会有此种保险措施以防她叛变，但莉音表示那不存在。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 时向莉央大人抱歉，并表示自己能与她共事是她极大的荣幸。时说她想和沙勒、和C&C的前辈们一起战斗——而她对此非常感激。她向莉央询问Abi-Eshuh的自爆密码，认为其能爆炸的能量应能彻底摧毁圣所——她觉得，以莉央的性格，应当会有此种保险措施以防她叛变，但莉央表示那不存在。

desc.en: 季提到了莉音曾說過的“電車難題”，指出“需要有人去拉下操縱桿”——但莉音打斷了她，指出那是她自己的錯，沒有去找人幫忙。季相信莉音，但不抱希望。

desc.en: C&C及時趕到，幫助季進行應敵。寧瑠嚴重警告了季，指出那樣的話絕不應該再在他們面前說第二次。
desc.jp: C&C及時趕到，幫助季進行應敵。寧瑠嚴重警告了季，指出那樣的話絕不應該再在他們面前說第二次。

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: 莉音詢問眾人如何趕到，而乃愛則表示C&C在情況變成這樣之前早已出動。莉音對此感到驚訝，詢問她究竟如何得知，而此時聖亞接入通訊，她表示她將直覺和預感告訴了乃愛。乃愛最後將季託付給C&C後離開。解釋完事情後，C&C眾人開始應戰。
desc.jp: 莉音詢問眾人如何趕到，而乃愛則表示C&C在情況變成這樣之前早已出動。莉音對此感到驚訝，詢問她究竟如何得知，而此時聖亞接入通訊，她表示她將直覺和預感告訴了乃愛。乃愛最後將季託付給C&C後離開。解釋完事情後，C&C眾人開始應戰。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央询问众人如何赶到，而诺亚则表示C&C在情况变成这样之前早已出动。莉央对此感到惊讶，询问她究竟如何得知，而此时圣娅接入通讯，她表示她将直觉和预感告诉了诺亚。诺亚最后将时托付给C&C后离开。解释完事情后，C&C众人开始应战。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音询问众人如何赶到，而乃爱则表示C&C在情况变成这样之前早已出动。莉音对此感到惊讶，询问她究竟如何得知，而此时圣亚接入通讯，她表示她将直觉和预感告诉了乃爱。乃爱最后将季托付给C&C后离开。解释完事情后，C&C众人开始应战。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉央询问众人如何赶到，而诺亚则表示C&C在情况变成这样之前早已出动。莉央对此感到惊讶，询问她究竟如何得知，而此时圣娅接入通讯，她表示她将直觉和预感告诉了诺亚。诺亚最后将时托付给C&C后离开。解释完事情后，C&C众人开始应战。

desc.en: Seia is a student from Tea Party of Trinity, who possessed the ability to foretell the future (deprived by Kuzunoha in Volume Final). She could see the future and interact/talk with people in her dreams.
desc.jp: Seia is a student from Tea Party of Trinity, who possessed the ability to foretell the future (deprived by Kuzunoha in Volume Final). She could see the future and interact/talk with people in her dreams.
desc.zh_cn: 圣亚是来自三一茶会的一名学生，具备预见未来的能力（但在最终篇中被葛业剥夺）。她可以在梦中预见未来并与其中的人互动交流。

desc.en: 莉音有些鬱鬱不樂。優香請莉音振作一些，而陽葵則插了一嘴，說莉音可就是這樣在“乾淨”和“渾濁”的兩條河裡頭淌水的人。
desc.jp: 莉音有些鬱鬱不樂。優香請莉音振作一些，而陽葵則插了一嘴，說莉音可就是這樣在“乾淨”和“渾濁”的兩條河裡頭淌水的人。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央有些郁郁不乐。优香请莉央振作一些，而日鞠则插了一嘴，说莉央可就是这样在“干净”和“浑浊”的两条河里头淌水的人。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音有些郁郁不乐。优香请莉音振作一些，而阳葵则插了一嘴，说莉音可就是这样在“干净”和“浑浊”的两条河里头淌水的人。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。
